title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
content: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5410318.0based on the above thread, and that Smoothie is selling them in rolls - I have asked him if he would set some rolls aside while I gather funds. This is to provide the availability to those interested in getting a set but are not wanting to get a full roll.Quote4-COIN SETSrandomly selected MATCHING # ROLLS of 20 of all FOUR COIN types (80 coins total)PRICE = 0.18 BTCThis puts the cost at .009 per set - the sets will be unfunded. Shipping will be handled once I have them in hand and will vary per individual based on whether they are in the US or international.Please post below how many sets you are interested in and then send in payment to the following address: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4es DO NOT SEND PAYMENT TO ANY OTHER ADDRESS EVEN IF YOU RECEIVE A DM FROM MEplease also include your txn id or send it to me in a DM

comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: I would like 1 set please. Could you please indicate which design you will choose for the rainbow coins? (Personally speaking I prefer D - but I will be totally fine with what the majority aggres on-)Edit: Did smoothie agreed on putting aside a 4-coins set? (just double checking, lol)

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: I think the group buy is for the 4 roll set so would be split up into 4 coin sets (1 of each variety) for roughly .05 each ü§î

If you or others are interested in funded coins, we can do another set of 4 funded rolls that will be .05BTC per set.

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: They all must be funded to face before they get shipped out so I don't think unfunded coins is an option

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: MoparThanks for being willing to coordinate the group buy. This is work and I am grateful. I want to see what Smoothie decides on the 10 coin set. If he offers that I will want to get this (one of every coin loaded).

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Yes these are for unfunded if interest is sufficient could do one funded set and one unfunded - i am driving and will update op In the end - I was trying to make this a simple process - with his op he stated it was ‚Äúrandom‚Äù but matching - I assume the ‚Äúrandom‚Äù is the finish
